Steps to reproduce:

Within the 'Firefox will:' listbox I've chosen the 'Use custom settings for history' item.
Then I've entered a couple of blocked sites (into the 'Exceptions').
Closed the 'Edit preferences window'.

PS 8.0+build1-0ubuntu0.10.04.1~mfs2


Actual results:

There's the 'Remember history' item instead my 'Use custom settings for history' I'd chosen before.


Expected results:

I'd say there should be my setting.
